effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to activate Luck of the Draw! causing you to cast Guardian of Ancient Kings for 4.0 sec. Your damage done is increased by 15% for 10 sec after Luck of the Draw! activates.
Set: While you have  Luck of the Draw! Shield of the Righteous refunds 1-3 Holy Power and extends the duration of  Luck of the Draw! by 0.5 sec, up to 10 sec.

Set: While you have  Luck of the Draw! Shield of the Righteous refunds 1-3 Holy Power and extends the duration of  Luck of the Draw! by 0.5 sec, up to 10 sec.

name: Test Subject's Clasps
description: Don't take 'em off - might need to identify your body.

effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to activate Luck of the Draw! causing you to cast Guardian of Ancient Kings for 4.0 sec. Your damage done is increased by 15% for 10 sec after Luck of the Draw! activates.
Set: While you have  Luck of the Draw! Shield of the Righteous refunds 1-3 Holy Power and extends the duration of  Luck of the Draw! by 0.5 sec, up to 10 sec.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

name: The Jastor Diamond

spells.description: Equip: Take Credit for your allies' deeds up to once every 12 sec, gaining 75 of their highest secondary stat up to 10 times until shortly after leaving combat. You have a 10% chance to get caught in the act, transferring all accumulated Credit to your ally for 15 sec instead.

description: I'm not gonna give you a detailed receipt of all the businesses I took over, started, sold, or destroyed. I won: that's all. I won everything I wanted.

name: Chromebustible Bomb Suit

spells.description:
Use: Rapidly deploy the bomb suit to reduce damage taken by 75% for 20 sec or until 8.4 million damage has been prevented.

Upon depletion, the bomb suit detonates to deal 703,168 Fire damage split between nearby enemies. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

description: When the only options are initial success or total failure.

name: Cinderbrew Stein

spells.description:
Equip: Occasionally share a drink with allies who assist you in combat, granting them 5,187 of their primary stat for 15 sec and absorbing 236,387 damage. You take a sip as well, granting 2,793 Strength and absorbing 1.2 million damage.

When you fall below 50% health, you take an emergency sip. This may only occur once every 1 min.

description: Watered down for consumption by lesser mortals.

spells.description: Equip: Your attacks have a very high chance to contaminate your target with industrial runoff up to 25 times, dealing 1,117 Shadow damage per stack every 3 sec until their demise.
Equip: You champion the causes of your guild.  All guild reputation gains are increased by 100%.
